channel.title: School hacking help [REQ]
channel.description:
Eh, I don't know if you'd even call this hacking. I would appreciate some help.
So-basic idea, get my teacher(s) pass(es) for our school's online grading system.
Key Points: Grading system is Aeries, you can acess it online, but you need the school code, which I can't find. Aeries is only installed on admin accounts (teachers). We have deepfreeze at our school, but I have an "undeepfreeze" program. I have yet to test it. I have multiple accounts on our school computers. CMD is acessible. I won't use my home computer at all, just the library's.
So, I've been thinking, quite a lot actually.
#1 I was thinking of making an admin account via CMD, then I'd use a cracking program with wordlists to crack one of my teachers Aeries accounts. Feasible? I would have to make a new account everyday, because you can only create, save, and edit accounts from the library computers.
#2 Get a good keylogger, (suggestions?) put keylogger on the disk/file I am to use while presenting something. That way the teacher puts it in their computer to show it on the projectors we have at school. Or I could just put the disk in when the teacher leaves the room. The thing is, our deepfreeze deletes everything except our personal H drives, so I would need it to install into there if possible...
#3 Same as #1 except I crack my teacher's school account passes, not Aeries. Then I could install a keylogger. But this is sorta impossible due to the fact that you only get 5 trys. Plus I need to get their usernames too...
Any ideas? What keylogger and cracker should I use? I was thinking of acessdriver, does that even do that shit?
Also, is there anyway they could trace it to me if I use other people's accounts at school, and I don't use my home computer. My main fear is having the system detect a keylogger on a powerpoint presentation or something.
EDIT: Thought I wouldn't have to tell people to not flame me because of morals. Wow.

item.title: School hacking help [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Try to access the system account, it’s the most powerfull account on the computer. There are some tut’s on youtube.

Read full topic

item.title: School hacking help [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @tomo6627 tomo6627
item.description:
@tomo6627 wrote:

Fellix, there’s no need to attack me, give me something worthwhile ie: aspects where I’m wrong or ways to do it.

And thanks Eh, but I have made one, but it probably got erased after I logged off or I probably couldn’t log onto it.

Ugh, I feel a flame-war coming on, let’s try to mitigate it eh? Don’t insult me and think I’ll be hurt by it. If anything, I’ll only consider you more of a moron. No, I will not flame you back if you’re just looking to start something, there’s no point. And yes, I’m aware that my first post may be painfully wrong/inaccurate to some. I understand the legal side of it so no moar posts on that?

Read full topic

item.title: School hacking help [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“tomo6627, post:1, topic:157911”]#1 I was thinking of making an admin account via CMD[/quote]Wouldn’t work, even you can access cmd there is no way for you to make new accounts on a student account.

Read full topic

item.title: School hacking help [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

this is epic fail.

why not just study and get good grades for once and get a fricken life? and if you acsess the school system, you could go to jail for hacking moron, exspecially hacking a school system. And if you changed your grade, teachers would notice, so over all this is just gay, i just say study and your good. And btw, you won’t be able hack a school computer, because you need more than a user and pass, you need the “school system admin” to acsess anything, if you have one teachers pass and users, you can only change one class grades.
overall: GAY IDEA

Read full topic

item.title: School hacking help [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

You can face some hefty legal problems if you do this. Also get a mandatory 10 day suspension and/or expulsion.

Still want to do it?

Read full topic
